0.3.0
=====

.. include :: ../index.txt

Download
========

The latest version can always be found at http://pypi.python.org/StringConvert

* `StringConvert-0.3.0.tar.gz <StringConvert-0.3.0.tar.gz>`_
* `StringConvert-0.3.0-py2.5.egg <StringConvert-0.3.0-py2.5.egg>`_
